artist: Artist: Abraham Bosse; Artist: or François Collignon
catalogue_raissonne: Meaume 31 (as Collignon) or Lieure vol. 3, p. 34 (as Bosse)
creditline: Gift of Elizabeth, Julie, and Catherine Andrus in memory of John and Marion Andrus
description: wreath with Latin type; interspersed among leaves are circles containing the letters IHS or MA
inscription:
Inscription

inscribed in plate: [VARIAE TVM PASSIONIS CHRISTI, TVM VITAE BEATAE MARIAE VIRGINIS.] / Israel ex. / cum privil. Regis
provenance: John E. Andrus III, Wayzata, Minn.; by descent to his daughters, Elizabeth, Katie, and Julie; gave to MIA, 2015. Earlier provenances have been gathered, but further research will increase our knowledge of their histories.
title: Title Page for the Mysteries of the Passion of Jesus Christ, and the Life of the Virgin
